comment_text: Thank God I came across Dr IGUDIA at the right time and I saw a lot of testimonies and how he has cured a lot of people from Hepatitis B virus then I contacted him for help and he actually cured me, he also has a cure for other form of STI

4:15 heat does not always tranfer from the hotter to the colder object. There is a very tiny chance (the bigger the object and the longer the time the smaller the chance) that it goes the other way around and the cooler object actually heats the hot object for a second, it's just very very unlikely since a pizza slice is already pretty big compared to the quantum world.
And by that logic 5:27 heat can even transfer when the temperature is the same I think
Thank you for making videos for absolutely free for all these years! Helps us a ton.
Wait until you get into the fun topics of heat transfer we had to deal with in engineering school. Ha, ha, ha!
